tweet:
LOOKING BACK AT THE 115th CONGRESS:

I’ve answered thousands of letters & emails from constituents on a number of topics. Many of these responses have been sent out via postal mail, and I’m grateful to my staff for helping me ready the letters for delivery. #AZ05 pic.twitter.com/rjQ4ZGdbKB

LAST BUT NOT LEAST - @CongressmanHice joined me on the final episode for 2018 to look back on the 115th Congress and to look forward to the 116th Congress. Grateful to serve alongside of him in this body.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/looking-back-on-the-115th-congress-with-rep-jody-hice …

.@MZHemingway has joined a select few journalists to expose the truth behind the corrupt dealings at the highest levels of the DOJ and FBI. I admire her work and enjoyed our conversation for episode #27.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/exposing-the-truth-with-mollie-hemingway …

Sen. Jon Kyl has given decades of his life to serve the U.S. in office, and Arizona has reaped many rewards from his efforts in Congress. Before he retired (again) from the Senate, I had the honor of interviewing him for episode #26.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/setting-the-example-for-public-servants-with-sen-jon-kyl …

America has a special alliance with Israel, and I am pleased with the efforts of @POTUS @realDonaldTrump & this Congress to grow our friendship. I interviewed @davidhorovitz of the @TimesofIsrael about the state of our alliance.
 
LISTEN to episode #25: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/commemorating-americas-alliance-with-israel-with-david-horovitz …

EPISODE #24 - Anyone heard of the Commerce Clause? @SenMikeLee has, and he has a lot of wisdom to share about this clause, and other aspects of the U.S. Constitution. I was honored to talk to him for this insightful episode.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/remembering-the-fundamentals-with-senator-mike-lee …

Our Border Patrol agents are too often the forgotten men and women of the fight to secure America's border. They face many hardships & dangers. I talked to Border Patrol agent Brandon Judd about their efforts in episode #23.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/standing-with-border-patrol-agents-with-brandon-judd …

Maricopa Co. Attorney Bill Montgomery joined me during Veterans Day week to talk about his service to our nation and the work he's doing for the county. I'm grateful for his continued service & enjoyed the conversation for episode #22.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/honoring-our-veterans-with-bill-montgomery …

It didn't take long for @RepDaveBrat & I to become friends, and it was fun to have our DC offices side by side these past two years. I will miss him greatly in the 116th Congress.
 
LISTEN to episode #21:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/being-fiscally-responsible-with-congressman-dave-brat …

Remember the caravans traveling to America this fall? I interviewed @JessicaV_CIS during the height of this looming crisis to talk about our nation's response & the actions we should take to secure the border.
 
LISTEN to episode #20:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/stopping-the-caravan-with-jessica-vaughan …

Before the past two years, most Americans probably wouldn't have started to identify FISA. Now, more is known, but not enough to satisfy many outstanding troubling questions. @jsolomonReports joined me in episode #19 to break down this issue.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/unpacking-the-great-fisa-abuse-scandal-with-john-solomon …

I thoroughly enjoyed working alongside of @LamarSmithTX21 in the @HouseScience Committee. He will be missed in Congress for years to come.
 
LISTEN to episode #18:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/exploring-a-new-frontier-of-space-with-rep-lamar-smith …

The past two years (especially) have shown the world how powerful the American judicial system has become. But was it always this way? @AndrewCMcCarthy joined me for episode #17 to discuss.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/the-evolution-of-american-judicial-philosophy-with-andrew-mccarthy …

.@PinalCounty @sherifflamb1 understands, coming from a county near the border, how vital it is to secure the border. He's fighting the good fight, and I talked to him about his job in episode #16.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/supporting-our-law-enforcement-with-sheriff-mark-lamb …

Mary Ann Mendoza's son was killed by an illegal immigrant in 2014. Since then, she has traveled the country to call on Congress & the President to secure the border to save American lives.
 
LISTEN to episode #15:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/saving-american-lives-with-mary-ann-mendoza …

I always enjoy talking to @tperkins on his radio program, and I was privileged to interview him for episode #14 to talk about the importance of defending life and religious freedom in the public square.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/defending-life-and-religious-freedom-with-tony-perkins …

A few journalists have made it their life's mission to uncover the truth about the corruption at the highest levels of the DOJ & the plot to undermine @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. @SaraCarterDC is one of them, & she joined me for episode #13.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/declassify-the-documents-with-sara-carter …

Towards the end of summer, I interviewed @Jim_Jordan for episode #12 to talk about how Republicans could salvage the 115th Congress by simply doing what we said we'd do.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/do-what-we-said-with-jim-jordan …

#RightToTry may not have become law without the efforts from @LauraMclinn, whose son, Jordan, was one of the faces of this cause. I had the honor of working with her and Jordan to pass RTT in the House, & she joined me for episode #11.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/give-them-hope …

EPISODE #10 - @RepThomasMassie joined me for a fascinating conversation on his diligence to read the bills we vote on in the House and his constitutional criteria for the votes he takes.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/read-the-bills-with-rep-thomas-massie …

I marvel at America's veterans and what many of them accomplish after returning from the battlefield. No less for @RobJonesJourney, who ran 31 marathons in 31 days in 31 different cities after a devastating injury.
 
LISTEN to episode #9: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/rob-jones-heroic-journey …

Before the horrific assault on Judge (now Justice) Kavanaugh's character, @JCNSeverino was helping to ensure his eventual confirmation by the U.S. Senate. We are indebted to her tireless work, and she joined me for episode #8.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/understanding-the-us-supreme-court …

EPISODE #7: @KyleKashuv has become a leading voice of reason for the Second Amendment debate. My staff and I have enjoyed watching his growth and listening to his articulate arguments.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/protect-the-second-amendment …

When I travel to the border, I'm fortunate to have Border Patrol agent Art Del Cueto as my guide. Art knows, firsthand, the realities and dangers of the southern border, and elected officials would be wise to heed his advice.
 
LISTEN to episode #6:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/secure-americas-border-and-support-our-border-patrol-agents …

This year, I had the opportunity to work with @SenRonJohnson to pass #RightToTry through the House & Senate. He joined me for episode #5 to talk about the Kavanaugh confirmation process, Right to Try, and his business mentality in Congress.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/confirm-judge-kavanaugh …

The fourth episode of "What's the BIGGS Idea?" fell during the Fourth of July week. I shared my thoughts on the importance of this American holiday.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/independence-day-reflections …

.@RepMattGaetz has emerged as one of @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's fiercest defenders, ensuring that corrupt officials are held accountable for their actions. I interviewed him for the 3rd episode.
 
LISTEN: https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/conversation-with-matt-gaetz …

.@RepGosar joined me for the 2nd podcast episode, talking about the deliberations over amnesty legislation and the necessity of securing America's border. It is an honor to serve in the AZ delegation with him.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/daca-amnesty …

Our first "What's the BIGGS Idea?" episode featured two House members integral to the conservative movement, @Jim_Jordan and @RepMarkMeadows. We talked about the just-released Inspector General's report.
 
LISTEN:  https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/department-of-justice-inspector-generals-report …

LOOKING BACK AT THE 115th CONGRESS:
 
This past June, I started the "What's the BIGGS Idea?" podcast with weekly episodes to give #AZ05 and other listeners insights into the issues facing our state and nation. We recorded 28 episodes this year.  https://m.soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623 … pic.twitter.com/dpQstTzxbT

NEW PODCAST:

For the final 2018 episode, @CongressmanHice joined me to talk about the 115th Congress & what to anticipate in the 116th Congress.

Thanks to everyone who joined us for the inaugural year of this podcast. I look forward to more in 2019.

 https://soundcloud.com/user-171694389-215186623/looking-back-on-the-115th-congress-with-rep-jody-hice … pic.twitter.com/2vMYFpjlXq

One of the fun events each year is the Congressional Baseball Game in D.C. Although I haven't participated in the action, I've attended both games and cheered on my colleagues on the field. pic.twitter.com/ouNe4P30iy

.@POTUS @realDonaldTrump is committed to securing funding for the border wall. Coming from a border state, that's a good thing. COMING UP: I’ll be joining @foxandfriends on @FoxNews to talk about the latest with government funding deliberations. @POTUS @realDonaldTrump is right to fight for the border wall. We must keep that promise to the American people. Watch at 8:45 EST. #AZ05

LOOKING BACK AT THE 115th CONGRESS:

One of the iconic pictures from my first term is this one with @VP Mike Pence saluting my father in law earlier this year in AZ. I'm thankful for the administration's love for our veterans & troops; my father in law appreciated the encounter. pic.twitter.com/lsWi2zsDgY

This year-end gov't funding bill may be our last chance, for some time, to obtain meaningful funding for the border wall. I am committed to finding a solution to reopen the gov't, but that solution must include the border wall funding we fought for in the House-passed bill. pic.twitter.com/fvKAqj6E4L

Members of Congress are still working to come to an agreement on a government funding bill that keeps the border wall promise we've made to the American people. I'm in D.C. this morning, getting ready to talk to @TeamCavuto about the latest. Watch at 11 EST on @FoxNews. #AZ05

Senator Schumer and Senate Democrats are playing politics with border security. Our Border Patrol agents need help. They need more resources, and they need a wall. The least we can do for them is to fight for $5 billion of border wall funding. #SchumerShutdownSequel pic.twitter.com/jKDeC25Y0X

100% agree. We need to send this bill to @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's desk. https://twitter.com/LindseyGrahamSC/status/1076206443685183490 …

.@POTUS @realDonaldTrump has promised to build the border wall. Members of Congress have promised to fund the border wall. We're still fighting to ensure that the increased wall funding makes it to the President's desk. I'll keep you posted with any new developments. pic.twitter.com/g4foGj5dPi

NOW: Joining @DanaPerino to talk about our efforts to fund the government, including the increased funding for border security. Unfortunately, Chuck Schumer is putting politics above border security, paving the way for a #SchumerShutdownSequel. Watch on @FoxNews. #AZ05 pic.twitter.com/vU96bKVQfw

As Congress continues to deliberate the year-end government funding bill, I have requested that my pay be withheld in the event of a government shutdown. I am still hopeful that we can reach an agreement - with increased border wall funding - before tonight's deadline. pic.twitter.com/bgeGhOQ4Uz

LOOKING BACK AT THE 115th CONGRESS:

A couple weeks after I was sworn in, I had the honor of witnessing the inauguration of @POTUS @realDonaldTrump.

The peaceable transfer of power is one of the many attributes that make our country one of the strongest & freest in the world. pic.twitter.com/SCTEhuwqLW

In January, Chuck Schumer shut down the government, putting politics above our troops.

He's about to shut it down again, threatening this time to put politics above border security. 

#SchumerShutdownSequel

I'm about to join @JamesTHarris to talk about the latest over our fight to include $5 billion of wall funding in the year-end spending bill. Listen on @KFYI or online at 4:35 AZ time:  https://ihr.fm/2ujYPi4  #AZ05

Today, the U.S. House of Representatives overwhelmingly passed the bipartisan "Justice Against Corruption on K Street (JACK) Act" with a 391-0 vote, sending it to @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's desk. 

STATEMENT:  https://bit.ly/2PP3Bio  #AZ05 pic.twitter.com/w3xyywy6kU

I expect a CR to be introduced on the floor, with the inclusion of at least $5 billion of wall and border security funding and no amnesty. I will vote for that bill. This may be the last chance to keep our promise to the American people. 

STATEMENT: https://bit.ly/2R7udzY

Closing catch & release loopholes should be among Congress's top priorities. The year-end funding bill is the last train leaving the station in this Congress. Read my op-ed for @FDRLST on the 3 Loopholes In American Laws That Enable Illegal Immigration https://bit.ly/2ExBaUe

we're trying.

We're trying everything at our disposal to ensure that the border wall is funded before the end of the year. You have a right to be upset if the wall isn't funded as promised to the American people. https://twitter.com/Debdeaid/status/1075736632253243392 …

LOOKING BACK AT THE 115th CONGRESS:

Some of my favorite moments on the Hill are when I get the opportunities to talk with visiting students. They are the future of our Republic, and I appreciate the times I can talk to them about their thoughts on the issues facing our nation. pic.twitter.com/BsHOUISBj7

No wall?

No end to Planned Parenthood funding?

No return to fiscal sanity?

One day, Republicans will wish we addressed these challenges when we still had the chance.

I'll oppose the latest year-end spending package that won't fulfill our commitments. https://biggs.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-biggs-announces-opposition-year-end-spending-deal …

Sharing Statuary Hall in the Capitol this morning with Barry Goldwater. I'm about to join @JulieBanderas on @AmericaNewsroom to preview the Loretta Lynch deposition in @HouseJudiciary. Watch on @FoxNews. #AZ05 pic.twitter.com/sNwgDxGLEx
